platform.summary: Support for analyses of RNA and small RNA sequencing datasets as well as for epigenetics or metagenomics studies.
sponsors: The ARTbio bioinformatics facility of the  [Institut de Biologie Paris Seine](http://www.ibps.upmc.fr/en) based at the [University Pierre & Marie Curie](http://www.upmc.fr/en/index.html).
